page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT and SPORT.
page.content: A television is a box with electric circuits in it.It also has an ariel which sticks out of the roof which picks up the television signals from a television centre.On television you can watch all different kinds of films and serial features. {CINEMA A cinema is a place where people gather to watch different films for example Indiana Jones, Star Wars and Ghostbusters { FOOTBALL Football is a game with 11 players. the aim is to score goals at the other end of the pitch in the opponents goalposts { NETBALL Netball is a game with two posts with a metal ring around the top the ring has a hole in it and you have to get the ball through the hole
